text: 1.30: Jer 23.5-6; Zo 17.19; 2 Ko 5.21Fhe Bakɨme nduara nde ndigap Krais Zisas phorgi. Ana Krais ndi tɨgi, ana nzan ndɨkndɨgi vhuuin nɨɨŋge ma. Fhe Bakɨme Kraisan panan, ana nza muuŋgim, nza tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigi kav, nza ana vuzvugi tɨvi zɨn vui. Nza Krais muuŋgi ŋaara panan Fhe Bakɨme taagiap nza vhezgiap, nza ndigim, tɨvi mbatɨgi wom nza gari fhu.
